an4.105:1.8: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, cattaro ambupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmim.
an4.105:2.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo amo hoti pakkavanni?
an4.105:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pasadikam hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam.
an4.105:2.3: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam nappajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam nappajanati.
an4.105:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo amo hoti pakkavanni.
an4.105:2.5: Seyyathapi tam, bhikkhave, ambam amam pakkavanni;
an4.105:3.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti amavanni?
an4.105:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pasadikam hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam.
an4.105:3.3: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an4.105:3.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti amavanni.
an4.105:3.5: Seyyathapi tam, bhikkhave, ambam pakkam amavanni;
an4.105:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo amo hoti amavanni?
an4.105:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa na pasadikam hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam.
an4.105:4.3: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam nappajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam nappajanati.
an4.105:4.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo amo hoti amavanni.
an4.105:4.5: Seyyathapi tam, bhikkhave, ambam amam amavanni;
an4.105:5.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti pakkavanni?
an4.105:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekaccassa puggalassa pasadikam hoti abhikkantam patikkantam alokitam vilokitam saminjitam pasaritam sanghatipattacivaradharanam.
an4.105:5.3: So ‘idam dukkhan’ti yathabhutam pajanati …pe… ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yathabhutam pajanati.
an4.105:5.4: Evam kho, bhikkhave, puggalo pakko hoti pakkavanni.
an4.105:5.5: Seyyathapi tam, bhikkhave, ambam pakkam pakkavanni;
an4.105:5.7: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro ambupama puggala santo samvijjamana lokasmin”ti.
